catalog_info.title: Gender & Sexuality: Comparative Studies of Islamic Mid. East, N. Africa, & S. Asia: Proseminar
catalog_info.description: Informed by theories of gender and sexuality, this seminar investigates how historically notions of desire, body, sex, masculinity, femininity, gender and sexual subjectivities have formed and reformed in Islamicate cultures of the Middle East, North Africa, and South and East Asia.
